src_original: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ?
tgt_original: 」佛告曼殊室利童子： 「諸佛妙法豈亦不勝？ 」曼殊室利白言：

src_original: mañjuśrīrāha - agrāhyatvādbhagavan agrā buddhadharmāḥ /  tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ?
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 諸佛妙法不可取故，亦不可言是勝是劣，如來豈不證諸法空？

src_original: bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ śūnyāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
tgt_original: 」世尊答言： 「如是！ 童子！

src_original: mañjuśrīrāha - tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate?
tgt_original: 」曼殊室利復白佛言： 「諸法空中何有勝劣？

src_original: bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
tgt_original: 」世尊讚曰： 「善哉！ 善哉！

src_original: evametanmañjuśrīḥ yathā kathayasi /
tgt_original: 如是！ 如是！ 如汝所說。

src_original: mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam,
tgt_original: 」佛告曼殊室利童子：

src_original: sacediha kācitsattvapariniṣpattiḥ syāt /  bhagavānāha - icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatamacintyadharmasamanvāgatam?
tgt_original: 「汝願佛成就不思議法耶？ 」「世尊！

src_original: mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamacintyadharmasamanvāgatam,  sacetkaścidacintyadharmasamanvāgataḥ syāt //
tgt_original: 若有不思議法實可成就，我願如來成就彼法，然無是事。

src_original: bhagavānāha - icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti?  mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti,
tgt_original: 」佛告曼殊室利童子： 「汝願如來說法調伏弟子眾不？ 」「世尊！

src_original: sacet kaścidacintyadhātuvinayaṃ (SaptaŚ,  Vaidya 351) gacchet /  na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有說法調伏真如法界，我願如來說法調伏諸弟子眾，然佛世尊出現於世，於有情類都無恩德。

src_original: taktasmāddhetoḥ?
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: tathā hi sthita eṣa dhātuḥ,  asaṃkīrṇa eṣa dhātuḥ,  yaduta acintyadhātuḥ /  tasmiśca dhātau na śrāvakanānātvam,  yāvat na pṛthagjananānātvamupalabhyate //
tgt_original: 諸有情類皆住無雜真如法界，於此界中異生、聖者、能說、能受俱不可得。

src_original: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi - anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti?  mañjuśrīrāha - abhāvatvābhdagavan puṇyakṣetraṃ tathagataḥ,
tgt_original: 」佛告曼殊室利童子： 「汝願如來是世無上真福田不？ 」曼殊室利白言： 「世尊！

src_original: tenaitadanuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetram /  yenaitatpuṇyakṣetraṃ nāpuṇyakṣetram,  tenaitadanuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetram /
tgt_original: 若諸福田是實有者，我亦願佛於彼無上，然諸福田實不可得，是故諸佛皆非福田、非非福田，以福、非福及一切法性平等故。

src_original: evaṃ tatpuṇyakṣetram /  tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate /
tgt_original: 諸佛福田雖實無上，而植福者無減無增。

src_original: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi - tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate iti?
tgt_original: 」佛告曼殊室利童子： 「汝依何義作如是說？

src_original: mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhagavan acintyaṃ tatkṣetram,
tgt_original: 」曼殊室利白言： 「世尊！

src_original: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt,
tgt_original: 」爾時，大地以佛世尊神力、法力六返變動。

src_original: ṣoḍaśānāṃ ca bhikṣusahasrāṇāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
tgt_original: 時，眾會中有十六億大苾芻眾，諸漏永盡心得解脫；

src_original: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam //
tgt_original: 七百苾芻尼、三千鄔波索迦、四萬鄔波斯迦、六十俱胝那庾多數欲界天眾，遠塵離垢生淨法眼。

src_original: ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ,  ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ,  tāvataḥ sattvānekaikastathāgataḥ ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā vinayet,
tgt_original: 假使於此一佛土中，有如殑伽沙數諸佛，一一皆住爾所大劫，晝夜常說爾所法門，一一法門各能度脫爾所佛土諸有情類，悉皆令入無餘涅槃。

src_original: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate,  tatkasyedānīṃ bodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyasi?
tgt_original: 」舍利子言： 「曼殊室利！ 若諸有情自性離故、無邊際故無增減者，何緣菩薩求大菩提欲為有情常說妙法？

src_original: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sattvānupalabdhiḥ,  tatko 'trābhisaṃbhotsyate? (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 342)  kasya vā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyate?
tgt_original: 」曼殊室利言： 「舍利子！ 我說有情都不可得，何有菩薩求大菩提欲為有情常說妙法？

src_original: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？
